text: Hello Job Seekers! I'm the Engineering Manager for LTK's MarTech team. I am looking for a HubSpot specialist who would like to be involved in building successful journeys and interactions for the success of our Content Creators and Influencers.  <https://grnh.se/fff41a183us>  LTK is a exciting high growth company with an amazing culture. The position is FT remote. Apply through the link below or reach out to me here for more info.
